statements: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT director, genre FROM movies WHERE director LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title FROM movies ORDER BY movie_title ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND release_year < 2010;
SELECT movie_title FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY movie_title ASC;
SELECT movie_title, director FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY director DESC, movie_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 AND genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY movie_title ASC;
SELECT movie_title, genre FROM movies WHERE director IN ('Christopher Nolan', 'Quentin Tarantino') ORDER BY genre ASC, movie_title DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT director FROM movies WHERE genre LIKE '%Drama%' ORDER BY director ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE genre='Action'
SELECT title, director FROM movies ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality='American'
SELECT id, title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 8
SELECT title, genre, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, director, rating FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT title, genre, rating, director FROM movies ORDER BY rating DESC, release_date ASC;
SELECT title, first_name, last_name, birth_date FROM movies JOIN actors ON movies.director = actors.first_name ORDER BY title ASC, birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT id, name, age FROM actors WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT title, genre, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' AND director = 'Michael Bay';
SELECT actors.name, actors.age, movies.title FROM actors JOIN movies ON actors.id = movies.director_id WHERE actors.age > 30 ORDER BY actors.age ASC;
SELECT movies.title, AVG(reviews.score) AS avg_score FROM movies LEFT JOIN reviews ON movies.id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY movies.title HAVING avg_score > 7;
SELECT actors.name, COUNT(reviews.movie_id) AS num_reviews FROM actors JOIN reviews ON actors.id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY actors.name ORDER BY num_reviews DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, nationality FROM actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT movie_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY movie_id;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year = 2020;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT movies.title, actors.name FROM movies JOIN movie_actors ON movies.id = movie_actors.movie_id JOIN actors ON movie_actors.actor_id = actors.id;
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM movies JOIN reviews ON movies.id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY title HAVING num_reviews > 5 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT title, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM movies JOIN reviews ON movies.id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY title ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM movie_info;
SELECT title, director FROM movie_info ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM movie_actors WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT movie_id, rating FROM movie_ratings WHERE rating > 8;
SELECT movie_id, review_text FROM movie_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM movie_info WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, director, release_date FROM movie_info WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan' OR director = 'Quentin Tarantino';
SELECT m.title, m.release_date, r.rating, r.review, r.reviewer_name FROM movie_info m JOIN movie_ratings r ON m.movie_id = r.movie_id WHERE r.rating > 8.0;
SELECT actor_name, birthdate, nationality FROM movie_actors WHERE nationality != 'USA' ORDER BY birthdate ASC;

SELECT m.title, m.director, r.rating, l.language_name FROM movie_info m JOIN movie_ratings r ON m.movie_id = r.movie_id JOIN movie_languages l ON m.movie_id = l.movie_id ORDER BY r.rating DESC, m.title ASC;
